review: An update on my Amazon Firestick. I was happy with it in the beginning, set up with no problem, connected to my internet instantly.Now I am constantly getting the message "Home is Currently Unavailable"  Go to network settings. When I check my network it shows signal strength "Very Good" and that I'm connected. So why am I losing the shows I'm watching, what does it mean that Home is unavailable? I have unplugged the Firestick, I am using the adapter, this is getting very frustrating.
